(ESMO)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"text-sm text-green-800 space-y-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Ibrutinib + Venetoclax combination"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 FCR/BR in fit, mutated IGHV patients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Time-limited therapy preference"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Comprehensive comorbidity assessment"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-amber-50 rounded-xl p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"font-bold text-amber-900 mb-2",children:"US (NCCN)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"text-sm text-amber-800 space-y-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Zanubrutinib as preferred BTKi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Multiple combination options"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 Minimal chemotherapy use"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u2022 MRD-guided treatment decisions"})]})]})]})]})]});const navigation=[{id:'overview',label:'Overview',icon:Activity},{id:'gender',label:'Gender Distribution',icon:Users},{id:'aging',label:'Aging Impact',icon:TrendingUp},{id:'treatments',label:'Treatments',icon:Pill}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-800 text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold mb-2",children:"Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-blue-100 text-lg",children:"UK Focus with International Comparisons \u2022 2025 Data"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-sm sticky top-0 z-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex overflow-x-auto space-x-1 py-4",children:navigation.map(item=>{const Icon=item.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveSection(item.id),className:"flex items-center px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium whitespace-nowrap transition-colors ".concat(activeSection===item.id?'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700':'text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-2"}),item.label]},item.id);})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[activeSection==='overview'&&renderOverview(),activeSection==='gender'&&renderGenderDistribution(),activeSection==='aging'&&renderAgingImpact(),activeSection==='treatments'&&renderTreatments()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 Guidelines, ESMO Guidelines, NCCN Guidelines. Last updated: June 2025"})})})]});};export default CLLDashboard;

sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, BarChart, Bar, PieChart, Pie, Cell, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, RadarChart, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis, Radar, AreaChart, Area } from 'recharts'; import { Calendar, Users, TrendingUp, Heart, Globe, Pill, Activity, ChevronDown, ChevronUp, Info } from 'lucide-react'; const CLLDashboard = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const [expandedCard, setExpandedCard] = useState(null); // Data for UK incidence const ukIncidenceData = [ { year: '1993-1995', male: 100, female: 100 }, { year: '2000-2002', male: 105, female: 106 }, { year: '2007-2009', male: 108, female: 110 }, { year: '2010-2012', male: 107, female: 112 }, { year: '2017-2019', male: 109, female: 114 } ]; // Gender distribution data const genderDistribution = [ { name: 'Male', value: 63, color: '#3B82F6' }, { name: 'Female', value: 37, color: '#EC4899' } ]; // Age distribution data const ageDistributionData = [ { age: '40-49', cases: 2, percentage: 1 }, { age: '50-59', cases: 8, percentage: 5 }, { age: '60-69', cases: 23, percentage: 20 }, { age: '70-79', cases: 35, percentage: 35 }, { age: '80+', cases: 32, percentage: 41 } ]; // Seasonal gender distribution (simulated monthly data) const monthlyGenderData = [ { month: 'Jan', male: 210, female: 124 }, { month: 'Feb', male: 195, female: 115 }, { month: 'Mar', male: 205, female: 120 }, { month: 'Apr', male: 200, female: 118 }, { month: 'May', male: 215, female: 127 }, { month: 'Jun', male: 208, female: 123 }, { month: 'Jul', male: 220, female: 130 }, { month: 'Aug', male: 212, female: 125 }, { month: 'Sep', male: 206, female: 122 }, { month: 'Oct', male: 218, female: 129 }, { month: 'Nov', male: 210, female: 124 }, { month: 'Dec', male: 201, female: 119 } ]; // Impact of aging on diagnosis const agingImpactData = [ { year: 1990, medianAge: 65, lifeExpectancy: 74.8, diagnosisRate: 4.2 }, { year: 1995, medianAge: 66, lifeExpectancy: 75.7, diagnosisRate: 4.5 }, { year: 2000, medianAge: 68, lifeExpectancy: 77.3, diagnosisRate: 5.1 }, { year: 2005, medianAge: 69, lifeExpectancy: 78.5, diagnosisRate: 5.6 }, { year: 2010, medianAge: 70, lifeExpectancy: 80.2, diagnosisRate: 6.2 }, { year: 2015, medianAge: 70, lifeExpectancy: 81.0, diagnosisRate: 6.5 }, { year: 2020, medianAge: 71, lifeExpectancy: 81.3, diagnosisRate: 6.8 }, { year: 2025, medianAge: 72, lifeExpectancy: 82.0, diagnosisRate: 7.2 } ]; // Treatment comparison data const treatmentComparisonData = [ { drug: 'Ibrutinib', UK: 85, EU: 82, US: 90 }, { drug: 'Acalabrutinib', UK: 75, EU: 70, US: 85 }, { drug: 'Venetoclax', UK: 80, EU: 78, US: 88 }, { drug: 'Zanubrutinib', UK: 65, EU: 60, US: 72 }, { drug: 'Obinutuzumab', UK: 70, EU: 75, US: 78 } ]; // Treatment guidelines comparison const guidelinesData = [ { aspect: 'First-line Preferred', UK: 85, EU: 80, US: 90, details: { UK: 'Acalabrutinib ± Obinutuzumab, Venetoclax + Obinutuzumab', EU: 'Ibrutinib, Venetoclax + Obinutuzumab, Acalabrutinib', US: 'Zanubrutinib, Acalabrutinib ± Obinutuzumab, Venetoclax + Obinutuzumab' } }, { aspect: 'BTKi Preference', UK: 70, EU: 75, US: 95, details: { UK: 'Moving to 2nd generation BTKis', EU: 'Ibrutinib still commonly used', US: 'Strong preference for 2nd generation' } }, { aspect: 'Fixed Duration', UK: 80, EU: 85, US: 75, details: { UK: 'Venetoclax-based combinations', EU: 'Strong preference for time-limited', US: 'Both continuous and fixed options' } }, { aspect: 'Chemoimmunotherapy', UK: 20, EU: 25, US: 10, details: { UK: 'Limited to fit patients with mutated IGHV', EU: 'FCR/BR in selected patients', US: 'Rarely used in modern practice' } } ]; // Drug efficacy data const drugEfficacyData = [ { name: 'Ibrutinib + Venetoclax', PFS: 90, CR: 88, uMRD: 72 }, { name: 'Acalabrutinib + V + O', PFS: 83, CR: 75, uMRD: 65 }, { name: 'Venetoclax + Obinutuzumab', PFS: 78, CR: 70, uMRD: 60 }, { name: 'Zanubrutinib', PFS: 85, CR: 68, uMRD: 45 }, { name: 'FCR (Chemo)', PFS: 65, CR: 55, uMRD: 40 } ]; const StatCard = ({ icon: Icon, title, value, subtitle, color = "blue", expandable = false, children }) => { const isExpanded = expandedCard === title; return (
expandable && setExpandedCard(isExpanded ? null : title)}>
{expandable && (
{isExpanded ? : }
)}

{value}

{title}

{subtitle}

{isExpanded && children && (
{children}
)}
); }; const InfoBox = ({ title, content }) => (

{title}

{content}

); const renderOverview = () => (

Male cases: ~2,500/year

Female cases: ~1,500/year

Incidence rate: 6.2/100,000

Under 40: Extremely rare

60-69: 20% of cases

70+: 76% of cases

Low risk: >90%

Intermediate: ~80%

High risk: ~63%

UK CLL Incidence Trends (Indexed to 1993-1995 = 100)

Since the early 1990s, CLL incidence has increased by 14% in females and 9% in males in the UK.

); const renderGenderDistribution = () => (

Overall Gender Distribution

`${entry.name}: ${entry.value}%`} outerRadius={100} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {genderDistribution.map((entry, index) => ( ))}

Male cases: ~2,500 annually (63%)

Female cases: ~1,500 annually (37%)

Monthly Gender Distribution

The male-to-female ratio remains relatively consistent throughout the year.

Gender-Related Findings

Clinical Presentation

  • • Women tend to present at earlier stages
  • • Men more likely to have advanced disease
  • • Women show better treatment response rates

Molecular Differences

  • • Higher unmutated IGHV in men (2:1 ratio)
  • • ATM deletions more common in males
  • • Women have lower rates of high-risk markers
); const renderAgingImpact = () => (

Aging Population and CLL Diagnosis Trends

Age Distribution at Diagnosis

{ageDistributionData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}

41% of new CLL cases are diagnosed in people aged 75 and over.

Key Aging-Related Factors

Diagnostic Considerations

  • • Increased incidental detection in elderly
  • • More comorbidities affecting treatment
  • • Need for geriatric assessment tools

Treatment Adaptations

  • • Preference for targeted therapies over chemo
  • • Dose adjustments based on organ function
  • • Focus on quality of life measures
); const renderTreatments = () => (

Drug Usage Comparison: UK vs EU vs US (%)

Treatment Guidelines Comparison

Drug Efficacy Comparison

{drugEfficacyData.map((drug, index) => (

{drug.name}

PFS:
{drug.PFS}%
CR:
{drug.CR}%
uMRD:
{drug.uMRD}%
))}

PFS: Progression-Free Survival, CR: Complete Response, uMRD: Undetectable Minimal Residual Disease

Regional Treatment Preferences

UK (NICE/BSH)

  • • Acalabrutinib preferred over ibrutinib
  • • Venetoclax + Obinutuzumab for fixed duration
  • • Limited chemoimmunotherapy use
  • • Focus on cardiac safety with BTKis

EU (ESMO)

  • • Ibrutinib + Venetoclax combination
  • • FCR/BR in fit, mutated IGHV patients
  • • Time-limited therapy preference
  • • Comprehensive comorbidity assessment

US (NCCN)

  • • Zanubrutinib as preferred BTKi
  • • Multiple combination options
  • • Minimal chemotherapy use
  • • MRD-guided treatment decisions
); const navigation = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: Activity }, { id: 'gender', label: 'Gender Distribution', icon: Users }, { id: 'aging', label: 'Aging Impact', icon: TrendingUp }, { id: 'treatments', label: 'Treatments', icon: Pill } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Statistics

UK Focus with International Comparisons • 2025 Data

{/* Navigation */}
{navigation.map((item) => { const Icon = item.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Content */}
{activeSection === 'overview' && renderOverview()} {activeSection === 'gender' && renderGenderDistribution()} {activeSection === 'aging' && renderAgingImpact()} {activeSection === 'treatments' && renderTreatments()}
{/* Footer */}

Data sources: Cancer Research UK, SEER, BSH Guidelines, ESMO Guidelines, NCCN Guidelines. Last updated: June 2025

); }; export default CLLDashboard;
